## DataSource.setFeatureState() method

Sets the state of the given feature id.

```typescript
dataSource.setFeatureState(featureId, { enabled: true });

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setFeatureState(featureId: number, state: ValueMap): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  featureId | number | The id of the feature. |
|  state | [ValueMap](./harp-datasource-protocol.valuemap.md) | The new state of the feature. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
